howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Simple three-step process to get your personalized BaZi fortune reading:

step1.title: Complete Payment
step1.description: Pay securely through Ko-fi using the payment link for your chosen package.

step2.title: Provide Your Information
step2.description: I will contact you via Ko-fi private message to collect your birth details (date, time, location, gender) and any specific questions.

step3.title: Receive Your Report
step3.description: Get your personalized PDF report delivered to your email within the specified timeframe.
